snippet.title: Candies 'n Curses - "Curse Crusher" Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Appstore: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/candies-n-curses/id1364187784?mt=8

Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tomtominc.candiesncurses&hl=en_US

---
Return to the Phantom King's mansion in the brand new Curse Crusher expansion - Candies n' Curses' big new game update featuring new enemies to vaporize, powerful bosses to slay, and a whole bunch of new flashlights, charms, candies and curses to collect! With the Peppermint of Souls in hand, our young hero Molli Pop dives once more into the spooky manor to free its tenants from their cursed fate. Does she have what it takes? Grab your flashlight and bring along your sweet-tooth, because its about to get sugary!

Features:

- Upon defeating the Phantom King, play through 6 new, much tougher stages - Bring your most powerful charms and flashlights as these stages shouldn't be taken lightly!

- Face-off against 14 new enemies - from exploding slimes to screaming banshees, and everything in-between!

- Test your might against 6 enhanced bosses, each of which wields powerful new abilities. You may even be rewarded with ghostly riches for slaying them!

- 6 new flashlights to collect - each with unique abilities that offer a wide variety of playstyles. Fling powerful pumpkin bombs across the stage with the Jack o' Slash Blade, or turn enemies into allies with the power of the King's Beacon!

- Need souls for those super-powered upgrades? iAPs now offer majorly improved value to help you out!

- 7 new achievements to earn - if you thought you already mastered Candies 'n Curses, think again!

- Various balance tweaks, gameplay adjustments, bug fixes, and more!

Twitter: @takoboystudios
